//This file depends in "{{resource_file_full_name_class}}"

using System;
using System.Windows.Data;
using {{ resource_file_namespace }};

namespace {{ converter_namespace }}{

    public class {{ converter_name }}: IValueConverter{
        
        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture){
            string valueAsString = (string)value;

            {% for key in resource_keys %}
            {% if  loop.first %}
            if (valueAsString == "{{ key }}")
                return {{ resource_file_class_name }}.{{ key }};

            {% else %}
            else if (valueAsString == "{{ key }}")
                return {{ resource_file_class_name }}.{{ key }};

            {% endif %}
            {% endfor %}

            return "";
        }

        public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)
        {
            throw new Exception("it is not possible convert from target to source");
        }

    }
}
